DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety KWA-0711 Chronic Idiopathic Constipation ( CIC ) patient .
DOC.brief_title: A Exploratory Study KWA-0711 Patients With Chronic Idiopathic Constipation ( CIC )
DOC.criteria: The patient experience few three SBMs per week 6 month prior enrollment The patient experience one follow sign symptom 25 % bowel movement 6 month : straining , lumpy hard stool , sensation incomplete evacuation Patients secondary constipation cause systemic disorder Patients organic constipation Patients receive intestinal resection
